[[=]]
[[collapsible show="+ About +" hide="- About -"]]
> It is the near future. After 36 humans possessing supernatural abilities are brought together, a world-shattering event known as the Pulse eliminates 99.6% of the anomalous population. As time passes on, humanity learns of the existence of the SCP Foundation, the things that it contained, and the way it all came crashing down. Emotionally raw and unapologetically dark, //Post-Foundation// is a story about the people -- and the monsters -- that remain. 
> 
> //Content Warning: Contains themes of suicide and suicidal ideation.//
[[/collapsible]]
[[/=]]
